text: Colleen Wakako Hanabusa (born May 4, 1951) is an American lawyer and politician. She was the U.S. Representative for the 1st District of Hawaii from 2011 to 2015 and again from 2016 to 2019.Biographical Directory of the United States Congress, "Hanabusa, Colleen (1951- )"; retrieved 2012-12-2. ==Early life== Colleen was born in Honolulu, Hawaii in 1951. She is the daughter of Japanese American parents. She calls herself Yonsei, which means that she is the great-granddaughter of people born in Japan who immigrated to the US. "Ikebana, Strong and Balanced" at HanabusaforHawaii.com ; retrieved 2012-12-2. == References == ==Other websites== *Congresswoman Colleen Hanabusa at U.S. House website Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Hawaii Category:Politicians from Honolulu Category:Businesspeople from Hawaii Category:Lawyers from Hawaii
title: Colleen Hanabusa
